item.title: 季风影响电力需求，印度液化天然气进口量将下滑
item.description: 由于季风雨导致天气转凉，电力需求下降，水力发电的增加又挤占了昂贵的燃气发电机的发电量，印度蓬勃发展的液化天然气进口很可能会放缓。【原文：India’s booming liquefied natural gas imports are likely to slow as cooler weather due to monsoon rains crimps electricity demand and increases in hydropower crowd out expensive gas-fired generators.】

item.title: 巴基斯坦征收牛奶税，现在卡拉奇的奶制品价格比巴黎还贵
item.description: 在征收新税后，巴基斯坦的牛奶价格飙升了五分之一以上，使这种主食奶制品的价格高于法国、澳大利亚和其他一些发达国家。【原文：Milk prices in Pakistan surged by more than a fifth after a new tax was applied, making the dairy staple more expensive than in France, Australia and some other developed nations.】

item.title: 印尼称 2025 年预算赤字可能低于预期
item.description: 印尼立法者同意扩大明年预算赤字的目标范围，赤字可能比之前估计的要少。【原文：Indonesian lawmakers agreed to a wider target range for the budget deficit for next year, with a likelihood that the shortfall could be smaller than previously estimated.】

item.title: 埃塞俄比亚总统阿比希望从国际货币基金组织和世界银行会谈中获得 105 亿美元资金
item.description: 埃塞俄比亚总理阿比-艾哈迈德说，埃塞俄比亚与国际货币基金组织和世界银行正在进行的讨论可能会促成 105 亿美元的资金。【原文：Ethiopia’s ongoing discussions with the International Monetary Fund and the World Bank may lead to $10.5 billion of funding, Prime Minister Abiy Ahmed said.】

item.title: 降息后多伦多成屋销售出现一月以来首次增长
item.description: 在加拿大央行将借贷成本从数十年高位放缓后，多伦多的房屋销售在五个月内首次出现增长。【原文：Toronto home sales rose for the first time in five months after the Bank of Canada eased borrowing costs from a multidecade high.】

item.title: 瑞银再失印度资深银行家，战略尚未明朗
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）的印度业务正在失去另一位高管，而该公司仍在制定在印度管理财富的战略。【原文：UBS Group AG’s India operation is losing another senior executive to competitors, at a time when the firm is still charting its strategy to manage wealth in the country, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 大选前项目推迟，英国房屋建设停滞不前
item.description: 由于建筑公司在周四举行的大选之前推迟了项目，英国的房屋建筑业在 6 月份暂停了复苏。【原文：Britain’s housebuilding industry put a recovery on hold in June as construction firms delayed projects ahead of the general election that culminates Thursday.】

item.title: 习近平敦促地区集团保护供应链免受美国限制
item.description: 中国国家主席习近平呼吁地区安全集团成员反击美国对高科技出口的限制，维护供应链稳定。【原文：Chinese President Xi Jinping called on members of a regional security bloc to push back against US restrictions on high-tech exports and maintain supply chain stability.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利和巴克莱对土耳其利率保持不变心存疑虑
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）和巴克莱银行（Barclays Plc）的经济学家们对土耳其在今年剩余时间内继续按兵不动持怀疑态度，因为土耳其开始通货紧缩的速度比预测的要快。【原文：Economists at Morgan Stanley and Barclays Plc are having second thoughts about Turkish interest rates remaining on hold through the rest of the year after a faster-than-forecast start to disinflation.】

item.title: 泰国央行行长发出稳定利率和通胀目标的信号
item.description: 泰国央行行长塞萨普特-素提瓦特那鲁普特（Sethaput Suthiwartnarueput）表示，基准利率符合决策者对经济增长和通货膨胀的展望，面对政府要求降息的呼声，他的立场坚定不移。【原文：Thai central bank Governor Sethaput Suthiwartnarueput said the benchmark interest rate is consistent with policymakers’ growth and inflation outlook, his stance unwavering in the face of government calls for rate cuts.】

item.title: 单只股票 ETF 正在狂飙
item.description:
投资工具通常将投资组合缩减为一家公司？这听起来可能很疯狂，但它正风靡一时。【原文：

An investing vehicle that usually contains a portfolio reduced to a single company? It may sound crazy, but it’s having a moment.

】

item.title: 巴西如何孕育出世界上最伟大的喷气机制造商之一
item.description:
关于巴西航空工业公司的难以置信的故事。【原文：

The incredible story off Embraer.

】

item.title: 欧洲央行必须为帮助法国设定 "非常高 "的标准，Praet 说
item.description: 欧洲央行前首席经济学家彼得-普拉埃特（Peter Praet）认为，欧洲央行必须引导投资者认识到，一旦法国金融市场出现压力，决策者不会轻易出手相救。【原文：The European Central Bank must guide investors that policymakers won’t easily come to the rescue of France in the event of financial-market stress, according to former Chief Economist Peter Praet.】

item.title: 新世界以八年来最低价出售香港公寓
item.description: 香港开发商新世界发展有限公司（New World Development Co.【原文：Hong Kong developers New World Development Co. and Far East Consortium International Ltd. are selling a residential project at the lowest price in eight years for the district, as competition for buyers intensifies amid high inventory.】

item.title: 规则收紧，韩国严查加密货币欺诈交易
item.description: 韩国监管机构正在加大对本地加密货币交易所的压力，以根除可疑交易，这也是本月晚些时候生效的新数字资产法为加强投资者保护所做努力的一部分。【原文：South Korean regulators are increasing pressure on local crypto exchanges to root out questionable trading, part of efforts to improve investor protection with a new digital-asset law that takes effect later this month.】

item.title: 汽车业务在中国实现增长，大陆集团股价大涨
item.description: 德国大陆集团（Continental AG）称，其汽车业务部门在中国的强劲增长将有助于抵消欧洲低迷的需求，随后该公司股价大涨。【原文：Continental AG’s shares surged after the company said strong growth in China for its auto unit will help offset sluggish demand in Europe.】

item.title: 巴克莱银行将其德国消费金融业务出售给 Bawag 公司
item.description: 英国银行业巨头巴克莱银行（Barclays Plc）同意将其德国消费金融业务出售给巴瓦格集团（Bawag Group AG），这是巴克莱银行精简其跨业务线和跨地域业务的努力的一部分。【原文：Barclays Plc agreed to sell its German consumer finance business to Bawag Group AG as part of the British banking giant’s efforts to streamline its footprint across business lines and geographies.】

item.title: 激进投资者 Cevian 参股英国史密斯和尼腓公司
item.description: 激进投资者 Cevian Capital AB 披露持有 Smith & Nephew 5%的股份，并将推动这家在英国上市的膝关节和髋关节置换产品制造商进行改进。【原文：Activist investor Cevian Capital AB disclosed a 5% stake in Smith & Nephew and will push for improvements at the UK-listed maker of knee and hip replacements.】

item.title: 美国 6 月就业报告将显示招聘大幅放缓
item.description: 预测人员预计，美国就业月度报告将显示 6 月份招聘人数减少，同时工资增长放缓。【原文：Forecasters expect a monthly report on US employment to show a step-down in hiring in June alongside a moderation in wage growth.】

item.title: 交易员在大选前推高英国资产赌稳定
item.description: 随着英国选民前往投票站，资金经理和银行策略师看好英国市场，预计周四大选后将出现一段政治稳定期。【原文：As UK voters head to the polls, money managers and bank strategists are favoring the nation’s markets in anticipation of a period of political stability following Thursday’s election.】

item.title: 中国和印度同意举行更多会谈以解决边界争端
item.description: 中国和印度同意举行进一步外交会谈，以解决长期存在的边界争端，这一争端使这对拥有核武器的亚洲邻国之间的关系陷入僵局。【原文：China and India agreed to hold further diplomatic talks to resolve a long-standing border dispute, which has stalled relations between the nuclear-armed Asian neighbors.】

item.title: 瑞士通胀意外放缓，商品成本下降
item.description: 瑞士通胀出乎意料地放缓；这为连续两次降低借贷成本的瑞士国家银行官员吃了一颗定心丸。【原文：Swiss inflation unexpectedly eased — offering reassurance to Swiss National Bank officials who’ve lowered borrowing costs for two straight meetings.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利称大选风险减弱，买入法国股票
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）策略师认为，投资者应在周日第二轮议会临时选举前买入法国股票，因为在两种最可能的结果中，市场都有可能反弹。【原文：Investors should buy French stocks before Sunday’s second round of the snap parliamentary elections because the market is likely to rebound in either of the two most probable outcomes, according to Morgan Stanley strategists.】

item.title: 南非延长临时签证申请优惠期
item.description: 新宣誓就职的南非内政部长莱昂-施赖伯（Leon Schreiber）已将目前正在等待签证、豁免和上诉申请结果的外国公民的临时优惠政策延长至 12 月 31 日。【原文：Newly sworn in South African Home Affairs Minister Leon Schreiber has extended a temporary concession for foreign nationals who are currently awaiting the outcome of visa, waiver and appeal applications to Dec. 31.】

item.title: 中国经济疲软，全球石油前景面临挑战
item.description: 今年上半年，全球石油市场面临着中国需求前景疲软的问题，这可能会给原油价格带来不利因素。【原文：The global oil market faces soft spots in the outlook for Chinese demand this half, potentially adding a headwind for crude prices.】

item.title: 铃木在印度启动 4000 万美元基金帮助农村初创企业
item.description: 铃木汽车公司在印度启动了一项 4000 万美元的基金，用于投资农村小型企业，这家日本汽车制造商的目标是进一步提升其在全球增长最快的市场之一的地位。【原文：Suzuki Motor Corp. launched a $40 million fund in India to invest in small rural businesses as the Japanese automaker aims to further boost its presence in one of the world’s fastest-growing markets.】

item.title: 德国工厂订单意外下滑，经济复苏乏力
item.description: 德国 5 月份的工厂订单出人意料地大幅下降，这是欧洲最大经济体复苏遭遇的最新挫折。【原文：German factory orders unexpectedly plummeted in May — the latest setback to the recovery in Europe’s largest economy.】

item.title: 英国股市有望在大选日延续涨势
item.description: 2024 年 5 月 13 日星期一，英国伦敦，通勤者在塔桥上行走。担心官方劳动力市场数据准确性的英国经济学家又有了新的担忧：对未填补工作岗位数量的怀疑。摄影师：Jason Alden/Bloomberg【原文：Commuters walk in view of Tower Bridge in London, UK, on Monday, May 13, 2024. British economists worried about the accuracy of official labour market data have a new concern: doubts about the number of unfilled jobs. Photographer: Jason Alden/Bloomberg】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事欧洲
item.description:
及时了解市场监测情况

Get up to speed with what the markets are monitoring

】

item.title: 现金充裕的能源交易商正在从大型石油公司手中抢购炼油厂
item.description: 资金充裕的大宗商品交易商们正在收购能源巨头们越来越不愿意收购的炼油厂。【原文：Commodities traders flush with cash are buying oil refineries that energy majors are increasingly turning their back on.】
